column2:
"[<%me>]
[and the other trusty ARKS]"

"That voice...Oh yeah, it's the
elder dragorii Rela serves..."

"[I must thank you for all you've done]
[Please come forth
and present yourself]"

"We finally meet...
Elder Ro'Kamiz, chief of the dragorii."

"[I've heard of you from Ko'Rela]
[It seems you've helped her quite a bit]"
"Oh now, not at all. I'm..."

"[She is a young, bright and vivid light]
[If you would, please stay by
her side and watch over her]"
"But, in my past, the things I've done to the dragorii..."

"[Dragons do not die]
[Their souls are reincarnated, and housed
in a new body, which flies up to the sky]"

"[This is where those souls gather]
[So you see, where we are concerned
there is nothing for you to worry about]"

"[Be not shacked by the past.
Look in to light and move on]
[That is all we wish for you]"

"...I don't know what to say.
You've seen though everything, haven't you?
I've got no room to argue, do I?"

"Chief of the dragonii...Ro'Kamiz!
I have a question!"

"You just said that dragons don't die, right?
But...what if a dragon was created
by humans? Would it die then?"

"[You...I see]
[You have a connection to that sorrowful dragon]"

"[Rest assured, dragons do not die]
[Their consciousness flows through this planet and is continually reincarnated and reborn]"
"[However, that is not guaranteed for an artificial dragon whose consciousness I cannot sense]"

"[However, the sorrowful dragon
has finally found true peace]"

"[That is the outcome spun
of actions taken by yourself
and <%me>, is it not?"

"[This is the time to rejoice in your
knowing him, not mourn his departure]
[Forget not that dragon's heart]"
"[Lord Kamiz!]"

"[Are you all right?]
[You are safe!]
[I'm so glad!][That's wonderful!]"
"[Sorry to have caused you concern, Ko'Rela]"
"If Rela is here, that means..."

"[Yes, the threat has past]
[Again, I'm grateful for your tireless efforts]"

"[<%me>]
[We shall surely meet again]"

"〔<%me>〕
〔そして、頼もしきアークス達〕"

"この声は……そうか、これが
レラ君の仕える老龍族……"

"〔此度の感謝を伝えたい〕
〔どうかそのまま
　奥へと参られよ〕"

"ようやく会うことが出来た……
龍族の長たる老龍族、ロのカミツ。"

"〔コのレラより聞いている〕
〔彼女が世話になっているようだ〕"
"いや、私は……"

"〔あの子は若く、鮮烈な光〕
〔どうか、これからも傍で
　その生き方を見守って欲しい〕"
"しかし、私は過去、龍族に対して……"

"〔龍は死なない〕
〔その魂は輪廻し、新たな肉体へ
　宿り、空へと飛び立っていく〕"

"〔この場は、その魂集う場所〕
〔故に、我らの所業について
　貴方が気にすることはない〕"

"〔過去に囚われず、光を見て
　前に進むこと〕
〔貴方に望むのは、それだけ〕"

"……まいったな。
全て見透かされているんじゃ
反論の余地もないじゃないか。"

"龍族の長……ロ・カミツ！
質問があります！"

"龍は死なないと、今仰りましたね！
では……人の手によって造られた
龍もまた、死なないのですか？"

"〔貴方は……そうか。
　かの哀しき龍に縁ある存在か〕"

"〔たしかに龍は死なない。
　意識はこの星の内に流れ
　輪廻と転生を繰り返していく〕"

"〔だが、造られし龍はその限りではなく
　その意識を感じることも、できない〕"
"そう……ですか……"

"〔しかし、かの哀しき龍は
　最後に真の安寧を得た〕"

"〔それは、貴方と
　<%me>の
　行いが紡ぎ出した、結末であろう〕"

"〔別れを悲しむでなく
　出会えたことを喜ぶべきだ〕
〔かの龍の想いを、忘れぬように〕"
"〔カミツ様ー！〕"

"〔ご無事でしたか！〕
〔ご無事ですね！〕
〔よかった！〕〔よかった！〕"
"〔心配させたな、コのレラ〕"
"レラ君がここに来たということは……"

"〔然り。脅威は去ったということ〕
〔貴方たちの尽力に、改めて感謝する〕"

"〔<%me>〕
〔貴方とは、いずれ、また〕"
